name: Robot Squad Simulator X
description:
Deal with the hardest missions which can't be performed directly by people due to the conditions. Human life and safety is in your hands!

Game features: - 4 different robots: 2 terrestrial, aerial and underwater - 6 training missions - 16 story missions which take place all over the world, in different settings - 10 different accessories mounted on robots - plenty of gameplay elements like: guards, explosives, mechanisms - upgrading parameters of robots and accessories - different types of missions: rescue, spy, exploration, military
